Title: Requires that legislation which affects the revenues or expenses of a political subdivision contain a detailed fiscal impact note identifying the source of such annual cost to the political subdivision
Summary: Requires that legislation which affects the revenues or expenses of a political subdivision contain a detailed fiscal impact note identifying the source of such annual cost to the political subdivision; further requires that any such legislation requires a 3/5 vote to pass.
LawCode: Amd ยง51, add ยง51-b, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to fiscal impact notes
